snippet: The most recent charges involved Stuart Hall, 82, best known for hosting the popular television program “It’s a Knockout” in the 1970s and ’80s and who still is featured on radio.
abstract: Veteran BBC television and radio presenter Stuart Hall is charged with three counts of indecent assault, latest prominent figure to be questioned since sex scandal erupted at Britain's publicly financed broadcaster.
lead_paragraph: The most recent charges involved Stuart Hall, 82, best known for hosting the popular television program “It’s a Knockout” in the 1970s and ’80s and who still is featured on radio.

headline.seo: BBC Personality Stuart Hall Charged With Indecent Assault
headline.main: BBC Personality Charged With Indecent Assault on 3 Girls
headline.print_headline: Britain: BBC Personality Charged With Indecent Assault on 3 Girls
